001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.nio.file.Files;
006import java.nio.file.Paths;
007import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
008
009/**
010 * Utility-class that invokes standard JDK utilities, but wraps {@link java.io.IOException}
011 * into {@link IllegalStateException} and creates missing parent directories.
012 */
013public class CoreFileUtils {
014
015    public static String loadFileContent(String pathToLoadStr) {
016        return loadFileContent(Paths.get(pathToLoadStr).toFile());
017    }
018
019    /**
020     * @param fileToLoad file to read the content
021     * @return the content of {@code file} or {@code null} if it's impossible to do
022     */
023    public static String loadFileContent(File fileToLoad) {
024        if (fileToLoad == null || !fileToLoad.isFile()) {
025            throw new IllegalStateException(String.format(
026                "could not load the file %s because it does not exist or it's not a normal file",
027                fileToLoad == null ? "<< NULL >>" : "'" + fileToLoad + "'"));
028        }
029        try {
030            return Files.readString(fileToLoad.toPath());
031        } catch (IOException ioEx) {
032            ioEx.printStackTrace(System.err);
033            return null;
034        }
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Saving the content into the file {@code fileToSave} (if the file is not empty - it will be truncated).
039     * All missing parent directories will be created if necessary.
040     *
041     * @param fileToSave the file to save into
042     * @param fileContent the content to be saved
043     * @throws IllegalStateException in case of something goes wrong (which must not really happen)
044     */
045    public static void saveFileContent(File fileToSave, String fileContent) {
046        if (fileToSave == null) {
047            throw new IllegalStateException(
048                "could not save the file content, because fileToSave is null");
049        }
050        try {
051            if (fileToSave.getParentFile() != null) {
052                Files.createDirectories(fileToSave.getParentFile().toPath());
053            }
054            Files.writeString(fileToSave.toPath(), fileContent);
055        } catch (IOException ioEx) {
056            throw new IllegalStateException("could not save the content into the file " + fileToSave, ioEx);
057        }
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * Copy the file {@code sourceFile} to the file {@code targetFile}
062     * and creates all missing parent directories if necessary.
063     */
064    public static void copyFile(File sourceFile, File targetFile) {
065        if (sourceFile == null || !sourceFile.isFile()) {
066            throw new IllegalStateException(String.format(
067                "could not copy the file %s because it's not a normal file",
068                sourceFile == null ? "<< NULL >>" : "'" + sourceFile + "'"));
069        }
070        if (targetFile == null) {
071            throw new IllegalStateException(String.format(
072                "could not copy the file '%s' because target file is null", sourceFile));
073        }
074        try {
075            if (targetFile.getParentFile() != null) {
076                Files.createDirectories(targetFile.getParentFile().toPath());
077            }
078            Files.copy(sourceFile.toPath(), targetFile.toPath(), StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
079        } catch (IOException ioEx) {
080            throw new IllegalStateException(String.format(
081                "could not copy the file '%s' into '%s' because of IOException",
082                sourceFile, targetFile), ioEx);
083        }
084    }
085
086}
